title: Adaptive Curriculum Tool Design and Implementation Project for Students with Disabilities

context.prior_knowledge: Basic special education theories and understanding of instructional methodologies
context.additional_context: Prospective science teachers develop and apply curriculum adaptation tools for students with disabilities, conducting team-based projects in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment

learning_goals: Learners can analyze and propose three or more curriculum adaptation strategies by disability type
Learners can prototype accessibility tools applicable to science curricula
Learners can improve the field applicability of developed tools based on peer feedback
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
